title: [Marble Springs, Cobbled Path]
description: The scent of the river, cool and refreshing, floats on the breeze like a gentle whisper.  Somewhere nearby, the soothing sound of wind chimes dances in the air, the light notes reminiscent of the laughter of children.  A stone flowerbed, set atop a squat pedestal, overflows with yellow loosestrife blooms.
